medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain located in the RLQ.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has had abdominal pain that has worsened over the past few days. She states that she also experienced chills, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea prior to presentation. There have been no prior episodes of abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Extensive psychiatric history, history of colitis, diabetes mellitus (DM), hypertension (HTN), status post cesarean section x 2, laparoscopic Roux-en-Y gastric bypass (GBP), abdominoplasty, open total abdominal hysterectomy with bilateral salping-oophorectomy (TAHBSO).
medical_history.social_history: Recent job loss, homelessness, and experiencing domestic violence from her male partner.
